select r.recruit_id, r.recruit_name, c.corporation_name, o.occupation_name, j.job_name, r.recruit_location, e.eduhigh_name, r.recruit_salary from recruit r join corporation c on r.corporationMember_num = c.corporationMember_num join occupation o on r.recruit_occupation = o.occupation_id join job j on r.recruit_job = j.job_id join edu_high e on r.recruit_eduhigh = e.eduhigh_id
order by 1 desc limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}
